4788

4789 </span>

4790 </span>

4791

4792 <span class="mf-link__text">

4793 <span class="mf-link__text__inner " >Montefiore Einstein Comprehensive Cancer Center</span>

4794 </span>

4796 </button>

4797 </div>

9915 x-transition:enter-start="-translate-y-full"

9916 x-transition:enter-end="translate-y-0"

9917 x-transition:leave="transition ease-in duration-300 delay-75 mf-navigation__drawer--leave"

9918 x-transition:leave-start="translate-y-0"

9919 x-transition:leave-end="-translate-y-full mf-navigation__drawer--leave-end"

9920 >

9922 <div x-ref="search" @click.outside="hideDrawer('search')" class="max-h-full bg-white py-24 md:py-32 overflow-y-auto">

10520 <!-- edit this content at /admin/config/regional/mecc_blocks_alert_bar -->

10521<p class="notranslate"><strong>Masking Update: Masks are encouraged, but optional, in most areas throughout Montefiore Einstein locations. 10526 <!-- edit this content at /admin/config/regional/mecc_blocks_alert_bar -->

10527<p class="notranslate"><strong><strong>Actualizacin sobre mascarillas: Se recomienda, de manera opcional, el uso de mascarilla en casi todas las reas de Montefiore Einstein. &nbsp;&nbsp;</strong><a class="mf-link mf-link--site-montefiore mf-link--light mf-link--small mf-link--direction-backwards mf-link--animation-default contents" href="https://covid19.montefiore.org/es/" id="walkin-es"><span class="mf-link__text__inner">Ms informacin sobre nuestras normas de uso de mascarilla.</span></a></strong></p>

10538 <div class="shrink-0 text-[0] leading-none">

14379<a class="mf-link mf-link--site-montefiore mf-link--primary mf-link--base mf-link--no-underline mf-sidebar__link" href="/research/blood-institute/bci-research" data-analytics-click-text="Blood Cancer Instiute Research" data-analytics-link-type="link">

14380 <span class="mf-link__icon mf-link__icon--leading">

14398 </a>

14399 </div>

14400

14401

14402

14403 <ul class="mf-sidebar__list mf-sidebar__list--level-2">

14404

14405

14406 <li class="mf-sidebar__item mf-sidebar__item--active">

14407

14408 <div class="mf-sidebar__item__inner" :style="`--menu-level: 1`">

14409

14410

14411

14412

14413

14414

14415<a class="mf-link mf-link--site-montefiore mf-link--primary mf-link--base mf-link--no-underline mf-sidebar__link" href="/research/blood-institute/bci-research/basic" x-analytics data-analytics-click-text="Basic Research" data-analytics-link-type="link">

14416

14417 <span class="mf-link__text">

14418 <span class="mf-link__text__inner " >Basic Research</span>

14419 </span>

14420

14421 </a>

14422 </div>

14423

14424 </li>

14425

14426

14427 <li class="mf-sidebar__item">

14428

14429 <div class="mf-sidebar__item__inner" :style="`--menu-level: 1`">

14430

14431

14432

14433

14434

14435

14436<a class="mf-link mf-link--site-montefiore mf-link--primary mf-link--base mf-link--no-underline mf-sidebar__link" href="/research/blood-institute/bci-research/translational-clinical-trials" x-analytics data-analytics-click-text="Translational Research &amp; Clinical Trials" data-analytics-link-type="link">

14437

14438 <span class="mf-link__text">

14439 <span class="mf-link__text__inner " >Translational Research &amp; Clinical Trials</span>

14440 </span>

14441

14442 </a>

14443 </div>

14444

14445 </li>

14446 </ul>

14447

14448 </li>

14449 </ul>

14450

14451 </nav>

14452 </div>

14453</div>

14454

14455 </div>

14456 <div class="lg:col-span-3">

14457

14458

14459

14460

14461

14462<div>

14463

14464

14465

14466

14467

14468

14469

14470

14471

14472

14473<div

14474 class="mf-section-header mf-section-header--minimal"

14475

14476 data-analytics-event="e_componentClick" data-analytics-component-type="section header" data-analytics-item-title="Blood Cancer Institute Basic Research"

14477>

14478 <div class="grid gap-16">

14479 <div>

14480 <h2 class="mf-text-title-2-serif">

14481 Blood Cancer Institute Basic Research

14482 </h2>

14483 </div>

14484

14485 <div class="grid gap-16">

14486 <div class="mf-text-body-2-sans">

14487

14488

14489

14490

14491

14492<div class="mf-rich-text" >

14493 <p>Through the power of sophisticated basic research in a highly collaborative and resource-rich setting, the Blood Cancer Institute is making headway in identifying novel, targetable dependencies of blood cancer cells.</p>

14494

14495</div>

14496 </div>

14497

14498

14499 </div>

14500 </div>

14501</div>

14502 </div>

14503

14504<div>

14505

14506

14507

14508

14509

14510

14511<div class="mf-spacer mf-spacer--md" ></div>

14512 </div>

14513

14514

14515

14516

14517

14518<div>

14519

14520

14521

14522

14523

14524

14525

14526

14527

14528

14529<div

14530 class="mf-section-header mf-section-header--minimal"

14531

14532 data-analytics-event="e_componentClick" data-analytics-component-type="section header" data-analytics-item-title="Fundamental Discoveries in the Mechanisms of Blood Cancers"

14533>

14534 <div class="grid gap-16">

14535 <div>

14536 <h3 class="mf-text-title-3-serif">

14537 Fundamental Discoveries in the Mechanisms of Blood Cancers

14538 </h3>

14539 </div>

14540

14541 <div class="grid gap-16">

14542 <div class="mf-text-body-2-sans">

14543

14544

14545

14546

14547

14548<div class="mf-rich-text" >

14549 <p>Blood Cancer Institute researchers are performing high-throughput sequencing and omics assays to investigate various research areas, including:</p>

14550

14551<ul>

14552 <li>Molecular dependencies, including signaling, transcriptional, and epigenetic regulation, of pre-leukemic stem cells (pre-LSC) and leukemic stem cells (LSC) in normal and malignant hematopoiesis</li>

14553 <li>Maintenance of healthy and blood cancer stem cells by the bone marrow microenvironment</li>

14554 <li>Identification of novel stem cell-directed therapeutics in leukemia and other blood cancers</li>

14555</ul>

14556

14557</div>

14558 </div>

14559

14560

14561 </div>

14562 </div>

14563</div>

14564 </div>

14565

14566<div>

14567

14568

14569

14570

14571

14572

14573<div class="mf-spacer mf-spacer--md" ></div>

14574 </div>

14575

14576

14577

14578

14579

14580<div>

14581

14582

14583

14584

14585

14586

14587

14588

14589

14590

14591<div

14592 class="mf-section-header mf-section-header--minimal"

14593

14594 data-analytics-event="e_componentClick" data-analytics-component-type="section header" data-analytics-item-title="Example of Groundbreaking Discovery in MDS"

14595>

14596 <div class="grid gap-16">

14597 <div>

14598 <h3 class="mf-text-title-3-serif">

14599 Example of Groundbreaking Discovery in MDS

14600 </h3>

14601 </div>

14602

14603 <div class="grid gap-16">

14604 <div class="mf-text-body-2-sans">

14605

14606

14607

14608

14609

14610<div class="mf-rich-text" >

14611 <p>In one example of the transformative work thats occurring at the Blood Cancer Institute, Montefiore Einstein Comprehensive Cancer Center researchers studying signaling pathways in hematopoietic stem cells that prevent the mutated cells from developing into mature red blood cells made a singular discovery. They registered that this pathway, known as SMAD2/3, was overactive, and theorized that blocking the pathway with a drug could allow normal blood cells to develop--preventing anemia that occurs with myelodysplastic syndromes.</p>

14612

14613<p>As a result, scientists around the world began testing potential therapies. Through clinical trials at Montefiore Einstein Comprehensive Cancer Center, they found that the erythroid maturation agent luspatercept (Rebloyzl) significantly reduced the need for blood transfusions to treat anemia in MDS patients.</p>

14614

14615<p>In 2020as a result of this groundbreaking workthe U.S. Food and Drug Administration approved the drug as the first new therapy for MDS in more than a decade.</p>

14616

14617</div>

14618 </div>

14619

14620

14621 </div>

14622 </div>

14623</div>

14624 </div>

14625

14626<div>

14627

14628

14629

14630

14631

14632

14633<div class="mf-spacer mf-spacer--md" ></div>

14634 </div>

14635

14636

14637

14638

14639

14640<div>

14641

14642

14643

14644

14645

14646

14647

14648

14649

14650

14651<div

14652 class="mf-section-header mf-section-header--minimal"

14653

14654 data-analytics-event="e_componentClick" data-analytics-component-type="section header" data-analytics-item-title="Learn More About the Blood Cancer Institute"

14655>

14656 <div class="grid gap-16">

14657 <div>

14658 <h3 class="mf-text-title-3-serif">

14659 Learn More About the Blood Cancer Institute

14660 </h3>

14661 </div>

14662

14663 <div class="grid gap-16">

14664 <div class="mf-text-body-2-sans">

14665

14666

14667

14668

14669

14670<div class="mf-rich-text" >

14671 <p>Learn more about the Blood Cancer Institute's <a href="https://cancer.montefioreeinstein.org/research/blood-institute/bci-research/translational-clinical-trials">Translational Research and Clinical Trials</a> as well as <a href="/bci-research">research published to date</a>.</p>

14672

14673</div>

14674 </div>

14675

14676

14677 </div>

14678 </div>

14679</div>

14680 </div>

14681

14682

14683 </div>

14684 </div>

14685 </div>

14686

14687 </div>

14688

14689

14690

14691
